description: Synovectomy for specific conditions (Evidence: pg no: 13, L611-L618)
scope: Treatment of extensive synovial conditions (Evidence: pg no: 13, L610-L618)

documentation: ANY of the following conditions: Rheumatoid arthritis or other chronic inflammatory arthropathies with failure of conservative management, Hemophilic joint disease, or Other diffuse synovial proliferative disorders (Evidence: pg no: 13, L612-L618)

codes.description: Arthroscopy, knee, surgical; synovectomy, major, 2 or more compartments (eg, medial or lateral) (Evidence: pg no: 16, L705)
Arthrotomy, with synovectomy, knee; anterior OR posterior (Evidence: pg no: 16, L681)
Arthrotomy, with synovectomy, knee; anterior AND posterior including popliteal area (Evidence: pg no: 16, L682)
